title: Professional onsite management, Breakfast bars available, Views
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Square Feet:', '1050', 'Address:', '675 E Azure Ave', 'Whether you invite friends over for a day at the pool or to show off your grill-master skills in the barbecue pavilion, Azures Apartment Homes embraces laid-back luxury and the modern comforts of today.', 'Our spacious apartment homes are outfitted with luxe details from wood-style flooring to stone countertops.', 'Plus, residents enjoy an array of indoor and outdoor amenities including a gym and fully equipped resident social lounge.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', 'Eco-friendly community features', 'Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Terrace featuring barbecue pavilion', 'Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi', 'Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance', 'Ceiling fans in living areas Select units', 'Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Professional onsite management', 'Separate dining area', 'In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
